price: 73. Kati na yango bokozalaka na bambuma ebele тропа kólia.
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
